page.title: 11Bee Keeping
page.content: Mr Reed lives at 8, West End Rd.(grid ref.996038). Mrs Reed works as a domestic help at{Bradninch Primary School. Mr Reed is retired. He owns a large garden. His hobbies are shooting, gardening and keeping{bees. He has been keeping bees for 44 years. At the top of his long garden he keeps 24 hives. There are about 20,000 bees in each hive. When we visited in June we saw a swarm of bees hanging from a tree (they were keeping the Queen Bee warm in the middle). Mr Reed has seen 10 swarms whilst he has kept bees. The bees fly around wild and feed on dandilion and clover in the Culm Valley. From these bees, Mr Reed gets 400lbs of honey a year. He{sells}it locally in 1lb jars (with his own name on the label) for Â£1 per jar. He makes about Â£400 a year.
